attributes.action: prevent the Royal British Legion from closing the Princes Risborough Club.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal British Legion is an important charity and the regional Clubs provide an invaluable service to their local communities. Two years ago £600,000 was spent on refurbishing the Club at Princes Risborough and until it's closure was announced it was turning over an annual profit. The building was literally built brick by brick by its members and also acts as a consecrated Memorial Hall. Please save this very important club from being closed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
